title: Tokens Plus Info
description: Access token, refresh token, and some additional information about the issuer, the client, and the end-user.

client_id.description: The ID of the application that asks for authorization. An IndieAuth client ID is a URL.

issuer.description: The authorization server's issuer identifier. It's a URL that uses the "https" scheme and has no query or fragment components. It MUST also be a prefix of the indieauth-metadata URL.
issuer.title: Issuer

redirect_uri.description: Holds a URL. A successful response from this endpoint results in a redirect to this URL.

refresh_token_expires_at.description: UNIX timestamp when the JWT expires
refresh_token_expires_at.title: "exp" (Expiration Time) Claim
